post.description: Book details required in the body of the request e.g., {'title': 'Machine Learning', 'author': 'Tom Mitchell', 'year': 1999}

delete.description: ID required in the body of the request e.g., {'book_id': 1}

put.description: Book details required in the body of the request e.g., {'book_id': 1, 'title': 'Machine Learning', 'author': 'Tom Mitchell', 'year': 1999}
